UserAuthentication:InternalMetadataAddre: The OpenId configuration endpoint for internal token. When testing locally, use for example https://localhost:6001/.well-known/openid-configuration
UserAuthentication:MitIdExternalMetadata: The MitId OpenId configuration endpoint for external Azure token, formatted as https://<tentant-id>.b2clogin.com/<tentant-id>.onmicrosoft.com/<sign-in-user-flow>/v2.0/.well-known/openid-configuration
UserAuthentication:ExternalMetadataAddre: The OpenId configuration endpoint for external Azure token, formatted as https://<tentant-id>.b2clogin.com/<tentant-id>.onmicrosoft.com/<sign-in-user-flow>/v2.0/.well-known/openid-configuration
UserAuthentication:BackendBffAppId: The client id of the 'backend-bff-app' application registration.
AzureB2c:Tenant: The tenant id of the current tenant, e.g. devDataHubB2C.onmicrosoft.com
AzureB2c:SpnId: The client id of the 'sp-b2c-<environment>' service principal with management permissions.
AzureB2c:SpnSecret: The client secret of the 'sp-b2c-<environment>' service principal with management permissions.
AzureB2c:BackendObjectId: The object id of the 'backend-b2b-app' application registration.
AzureB2c:BackendSpnObjectId: The object id of the 'backend-b2b-app' service principal (the enterprise application for the application registration).
AzureB2c:BackendId: The client id of the 'backend-b2b-app' application registration.
KeyVault:TokenSignKeyVault: The address of the key vault containing the token signing key.
KeyVault:TokenSignKeyName: The name of the key used to sign the token.
KeyVault:CertificatesKeyVault: The address of the key vault containing the actor certificates
